General.Name: Visionox Technology Inc
General.Description: Visionox Technology Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells organic light emitting display products worldwide. The company also offers microLED products with applications covering smartphones, smart wearables, tablets, notebook, computers, and automotive display, supersize, etc. It also provides aftersales services. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Chaoyang, China.

8.Name: Mr. Feng Feng  Zhang
8.Title: Employee Representative Supervisor of Capital Management Department & Financing Mang.
